scripts.startup:
--disable AI disableAi(1) disableAi(2) disableAi(3)
--allied units createUnit('mage_tower', 1, startLocation(2)) giveResource('gold', 1, 1000); giveResource('wood', 1, 1000); createUnit('summoner_guild', 1, startLocation(2)) giveUpgradeCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'ancient_summoning') createUnit('energy_source', 1, startLocation(2)) createUnit('summoner', 1, startLocation(2)) summonerUnit= lastCreatedUnit() setCameraPosition(unitPosition(summonerUnit)) givePositionCommand(summonerUnit, 'attack', startLocation(1))
--player units for i=1, 3 do createUnit('battlemage', 0, startLocation(2)) end for i=1, 5 do createUnit('daemon', 0, startLocation(2)) end
--enemy units village createUnit('library', 2, startLocation(1)) libraryUnit= lastCreatedUnit() createUnit('golem', 2, startLocation(1))
--create enemy attackers for i=1, 2 do createUnit('daemon', 2, startLocation(1)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(2)) end createUnit('ghost_armor', 2, startLocation(1)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(2))
--objectives objective='destroy_west_village' showMessage('Brief1', 'Storming') setDisplayText('ObjectiveWest')
scripts.unitCreated:
--send units attack location 0 if objective=='destroy_north_east_village' and unitFaction(lastCreatedUnit())==1 then firstArmorUnit=lastCreatedUnit() givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(0)) givePositionCommand(summonerUnit, 'attack', startLocation(0))
for i=1, 2 do createUnit('guard', 3, startLocation(0)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(1)) end end
--send units attack location 3 if objective=='destroy_south_east_village' and unitFaction(lastCreatedUnit())==1 then givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(3)) givePositionCommand(firstArmorUnit, 'attack', startLocation(3)) givePositionCommand(summonerUnit, 'attack', startLocation(3))
--create enemy attackers createUnit('ornithopter', 3, startLocation(3)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(0)) createUnit('archmage', 2, startLocation(3)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(0)) createUnit('battlemage', 2, startLocation(3)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(0)) end
scripts.unitDied:
--check for summoner dying if lastDeadUnit()==summonerUnit then clearDisplayText() setPlayerAsWinner(2) setPlayerAsWinner(3) endGame() end
--check for first village destroyed if lastDeadUnit()==libraryUnit then --summon ghost armor giveProductionCommand(summonerUnit, 'ghost_armor')
--send reinforcements createUnit('daemon', 0, startLocation(2)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'move', startLocation(1))
--send reinforcements createUnit('battlemage', 0, startLocation(2)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'move', startLocation(1))
--create next village createUnit('guard', 3, startLocation(0)) createUnit('farm', 3, startLocation(0)) createUnit('technodrome', 3, startLocation(0)) technodromeUnit= lastCreatedUnit()
--create enemy attackers for i=1, 2 do createUnit('archer', 3, startLocation(0)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(1)) end createUnit('swordman', 3, startLocation(0)) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack', startLocation(1))
--change objective objective='destroy_north_east_village' setDisplayText('ObjectiveNorthEast') end
--check for second village destroyed if lastDeadUnit()==technodromeUnit then
--summon ghost armor giveProductionCommand(summonerUnit, 'ghost_armor')
--create next village createUnit('farm', 3, startLocation(3)) createUnit('aerodrome', 3, startLocation(3)) createUnit('behemoth', 2, startLocation(3)) createUnit('archmage_tower', 2, startLocation(3)) archmageTowerUnit= lastCreatedUnit()
--change objective objective='destroy_south_east_village' setDisplayText('ObjectiveSouthEast') end
--check for last village destroyed if lastDeadUnit()==archmageTowerUnit then clearDisplayText() setPlayerAsWinner(0) setPlayerAsWinner(1) endGame() end
